title: System Shock: Enhanced Edition
notes: Internal error of the game because is a source port that will be released in future in stable branch: "Error ..\..\source\rhi\d3d11\rhiContextD3D11.cpp Line:75"

title: System Shock: Enhanced Edition
notes: I've only played the first few rooms but everything worked fine in the backer beta version (Source Port), the normal version however was an unresponsive black screen.

title: System Shock: Enhanced Edition
notes:
To get SS:EE to run, you must download the beta which includes the new Direct3D source port the devs are making. To access the beta, you must enter the beta code "saltthosefries" without the quotes. Once the beta is installed, Proton will do it's DXVK magic and the game will launch.

I'm unable to get music playing though. Still, game is otherwise 100% stable.
Everything (except music) works excellent. Better yet, there's an OpenGL renderer that works superbly even with heavy use of MSAA
title: System Shock: Enhanced Edition

notes: No need to select Beta version of game now, but still no music.
